#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
char a[100005];
char* strev(char a[])
{
    int n = strlen(a);
    for(int i=0;i<n/2;++i){
        a[i] = (a[i] + a[n-i-1]) - (a[n-i-1] = a[i]);
    }
    return a;
}
int main() {
	int n,m,i,t;
	scanf(" %d",&t);
	while(t--){
	    scanf(" %s",a);
	    n = strlen(a);
	    scanf(" %d",&m);
	    printf("%s",a+m-1);
	    a[m-1]='\0';
	    if((n-m+1) % 2)
	      printf("%s\n",strev(a));
	    else
	      printf("%s\n",a);
	}
	return 0;
}
